chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
m: nat
n: nat
p: pos m

Goal:
pos_both n m (pos_right n p) = inr p

Premises:
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
pos_both : forall n m : nat, pos (n + m) -> pos n + pos m
pos_right : forall n m : nat, pos m -> pos (n + m)
Notation pos := Fin.t
pos_both_left : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos n), pos_both n m (pos_left m p) = inl p
Nat.min_max_distr : forall n m p : nat, Nat.min n (Nat.max m p) = Nat.max (Nat.min n m) (Nat.min n p)
Nat.add_assoc : forall n m p : nat, n + (m + p) = n + m + p
BinIntDef.Z.div2 = fun z : BinNums.Z => match z with | BinNums.Zpos (BinNums.xI _ as p) | BinNums.Zpos (BinNums.xO _ as p) => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.div2 p) | BinNums.Zneg p => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.div2_up p) | _ => BinNums.Z0 end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.div2 _%Z_scope
VectorSpec.replace_id : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (p : pos n) (v : VectorDef.t A n), VectorDef.replace v p (VectorDef.nth v p) = v
Fin.depair = fix depair (m n : nat) (o : pos m) (p : pos n) {struct o} : pos (m * n) := match o in (pos n0) return (pos (n0 * n)) with | @Fin.F1 m' => Fin.L (m' * n) p | @Fin.FS n0 o' => Fin.R n (depair n0 n o' p) end : forall m n : nat, pos m -> pos n -> pos (m * n) Arguments Fin.depair {m n}%nat_scope
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
Fin.of_nat : forall p n : nat, pos n + {exists m : nat, p = n + m}
Fin.eqb_nat_eq : forall (m n : nat) (p : pos m) (q : pos n), Fin.eqb p q = true -> m = n
Nat.gcd_add_mult_diag_r : forall n m p : nat, Nat.gcd n (m + p * n) = Nat.gcd n m
pos_iso : forall n m : nat, n = m -> pos n -> pos m
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- Type] ?B : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- Type] ?C : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p0 = q where ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat] ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- Type] ?B : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- Type]
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat] ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p0 : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p0)) = p0 where ?m : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- Type] ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n0 p0)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat m : nat p : pos m |- nat]
Fin.eqb_eq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), Fin.eqb p q = true < -> p = q

```coq
intros.
unfold pos_both.
rewrite <- pos_right_left.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros. unfold pos_both. rewrite <- pos_right_left. auto.
